title: resources
text:
Wanted: code reviwers
Here is a list of GitHub projects that are thristy for a second pair of eyes:

DNAm-clustering: pipeline to apply EP-means clustering algorithm to high-dimentional data
verywise: R package for vertex-wise whole-brain multilevel analyses
GuRu: Dashboard to navigate Generation R dataset
genomit_PMD: ML-Based Mutation Classification in Primary Mitochondrial Diseases

title: about
text:
Welcome to the EMC Programming Caf√©!
We are a (self-organised) group of bio-medical researchers based at Erasmus Medical Center (in Rotterdam, NL). Our glorious purpose is to support each other with all sort of ‚Äúcoding matters‚Äù. We talk about programming, scripting, software configs, visualization, stats and open science challenges in general.
We meet (usually bi-monthly) to share knowledge, ‚Äúpair program‚Äù, review each others‚Äô code or, sometimes, just to have a chat.
You could sumamrise our interests into 6 general themes:

title: about
text:
ü´±üèΩ‚Äçü´≤üèª Code of Conduct
Participants are expected to follow these guidelines:

Use welcoming and inclusive language.
Be respectful of different viewpoints and experiences.
Gracefully accept constructive criticism.
Focus on what is best for the community.
Show courtesy and respect towards other community members.
